meanings.sent1: The elephant is the largest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The largest pizza in the world measured 122 feet in diameter.

meanings.definition: Most considerable in size or quantity
meanings.sent1: The largest box in the room held all the toys.
meanings.sent2: The largest pumpkin at the fair weighed over 1,000 pounds.
meanings.sent3: The largest cake at the party was big enough to feed an army!
meanings.sent4: His heart held the largest amount of love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The largest wave crashed against the shore with a deafening roar.
